title: Richard Dawkins - Wikipedia
snippet: Richard Dawkins (born 26 March 1941) is a British evolutionary biologist, zoologist, science communicator and author. He is an emeritus fellow of New College, Oxford. In 1995 he was named the first Simonyi Professor for the Public Understanding of Science, a position he held until 2008, and is ...

title: Richard Dawkins - Students | Britannica Kids | Homework Help
snippet: More books followed, including The Extended Phenotype (1982), The Blind Watchmaker (1986), which won the Royal Society of Literature Award in 1987, River Out of Eden (1995), and Climbing Mount Improbable (1996).
